# Autogenerated file, run tools/build/setup_cmake.py to regenerate

include_directories(${BOOST.FILESYSTEM_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.GRAPH_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.PROGRAMOPTIONS_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.RANDOM_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.SYSTEM_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${GPERFTOOLS_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${LOG4CXX_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${TCMALLOC_HEAPCHECKER_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${TCMALLOC_HEAPPROFILER_INCLUDE_PATH})
link_directories(${BOOST.FILESYSTEM_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.GRAPH_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.PROGRAMOPTIONS_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.RANDOM_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.SYSTEM_LINK_PATH}
        ${GPERFTOOLS_LINK_PATH}
        ${LOG4CXX_LINK_PATH}
        ${TCMALLOC_HEAPCHECKER_LINK_PATH}
        ${TCMALLOC_HEAPPROFILER_LINK_PATH})

set(pytests ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/base/examples/log.py)

foreach (test ${pytests})
 GET_FILENAME_COMPONENT(name ${test} NAME_WE)
 add_test("base.${name}" ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/setup_environment.sh ${IMP_PYTHON} ${test})
 set_tests_properties("base.${name}" PROPERTIES LABELS "base;example")
  #add_dependencies(${name} RMFPython)
endforeach(test)

set(cpp_tests )

foreach (test ${cpp_tests})
   GET_FILENAME_COMPONENT(name ${test} NAME_WE)
   add_executable("base.${name}" ${test})
   target_link_libraries("base.${name}"     imp_base
    
    ${BOOST.FILESYSTEM_LIBRARIES} ${BOOST.PROGRAMOPTIONS_LIBRARIES} ${BOOST.SYSTEM_LIBRARIES} ${BOOST.GRAPH_LIBRARIES} ${BOOST.RANDOM_LIBRARIES} ${GPERFTOOLS_LIBRARIES} ${TCMALLOC_HEAPPROFILER_LIBRARIES} ${TCMALLOC_HEAPCHECKER_LIBRARIES} ${LOG4CXX_LIBRARIES})
   set_target_properties("base.${name}" PROPERTIES
                         RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/test/base/"
                         OUTPUT_NAME "${name}")
   add_test("base.${name}" ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/setup_environment.sh "${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/test/base/${name}")
   set_tests_properties("base.${name}" PROPERTIES LABELS "base;example")
   set(executables ${executables} "base.${name}")
endforeach(test)

add_custom_target("imp_base_examples" ALL DEPENDS ${executables})
